subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Mike Edwards Files/Question to Shay Clark and a voice said yes.wav 
  Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
  Description : I asked a deceased friend named Shay Clark if he could help me get in touch with my father who died in 1987. I believe I received a yes.  Please advise if any of you hear different. The yes is near the end 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/Question%20to%20Shay%20Clark%20and%20a%20voice%20said%20yes.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...>
